recipe.rDesc: 1/2 lb chicken breast; 14 1/2 oz chicken broth; 14 1/2 oz water; 2 tsps chili powder; 1 cup corn; 8 oz salsa; 1 cup chopped carrots
recipe.rProc: 1. In a large saucepan, combine chicken, broth, water and chili powder. 2. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 5 minutes. 3. Add corn and carrots and return to a boil. 4. Reduce heat and cover and simmer till chicken is no longer pink and corn is tender. 5. Add salsa and heat through. Garnish with cheese if desired.

recipe.rDesc: 2 cucumbers; 4 tomatoes; 1 green bell pepper; 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil; 3 tablespoons lemon juice
recipe.rProc: 1. Finely dice each vegetable. 2. Combine the ingredients in a serving container and toss well. 3. If time allows, let the salad stand at room temperature for 30 minutes before serving.

recipe.rName: Warm Eggplant and Goat Cheese Sandwiches (24 cals)
recipe.rDesc: Olive oil, eggplant, goat cheese, sandwich rolls, tomato, arugula
recipe.rProc: 1. Preheat oven to 275°. 2. Brush oil over eggplant. 3. Heat a large nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat. Add eggplant; cook 5 minutes on each side or until lightly browned. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. 4. Spread about 1 tablespoon of goat cheese over cut side of each roll half. Place rolls on a baking sheet, cheese sides up; bake at 275° for 8 to 10 minutes or until thoroughly heated. 5. Remove from oven; top bottom half of each roll with 1 eggplant slice, 1 tomato slice, and 1/2 cup arugula. Top sandwiches with top halves of rolls.

recipe.rDesc: 1/2 banana, sliced, 6 oz skim milk, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/3 cup ice crushed
recipe.rProc: 1. Chop half a banana into slices, place in plastic baggy and freeze overnight. 2. Gather ingredients. 3. Place half banana (now chopped and frozen) into blender. Add 1/3 cup ice, 6 ounces of skim milk and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract. Blend until smooth. 4. (Optional: Add 1 packet of Splenda for extra sweetness) 5. Pour mix into tall glass. Sprinkle about 1 teaspoon of ground cinnamon on shake.
1. Mix all ingredients together. 2. Fry with little oil for about 5 minutes.

recipe.rDesc: 1 chicken burrito, 3 oz chicken, 1/2 cup diced tomatoes, 3 tbs diced onion, 1/2 Avocado, 1 flour tortilla, 1/4 tsp salt
recipe.rProc: 1. Grill Chicken 2. Dice tomatoes and onions and mix, set aside 3. Heat burrito lightly 4. Smash avocado on tortilla till flat 5. Add chicken and tomato onion salsa 6. Sprinkle salt

recipe.rName: Black Bean and Corn Chili Recipe (100 cals)
recipe.rDesc: 1 clove garlic or 1 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 cup onion, 15 ounce can black beans, drained, rinsed, 15 ounce can tomatoes, 17g (1 Tbsp) tomato paste with salt, 1 cup frozen corn, 1 tsp sugar, 1 tsp chili powder, 1 tsp cumin, 1/2 cup chopped green pepper
recipe.rProc: 1. Saute onion and garlic until onion is clear. 2. Add beans, tomatoes, tomato paste, corn, sugar and spices. Mix and heat to boiling then reduce heat and simmer. 3. Add green pepper and continue simmering until tender. 4. Note: Omitting the sugar only reduces sugars by 0.7 g per serving and calories by 3 by serving.

recipe.rDesc: 1 zucchini grated, 1 potato peeled and grated, 1 carrot grated, 1/4 cup onion grated, 1/2 tsp oregano, 2 egg whites
recipe.rProc: 1. Combine ingredients, mix well. 2. Pour 1/2 cup batter on hot griddle. 3. Fry 2 to 3 minutes on each side.

recipe.rDesc: 6 garlic cloves, 2 cups basil leaves, 1/4 cup pine nuts, 1/4 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1 tablespoon olive oil
recipe.rProc: 1. mix all ingredients in food processor. 2. scrape into container and refrigerate

recipe.rDesc: 1 tbsp. margarine, 1/4 cup flour, 1 tsp. salt, 1 pinch nutmeg, 3 cups skim milk, 1/4 tsp. pepper, 1 tbsp. chopped parsley, 1 tsp. minced garlic
recipe.rProc: 1. Heat margarine over medium heat in a medium-sized saucepan until melted. 2. Add flour; Cook, stirring for 1 minute. 3. Whisk in milk, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. 4. Bring to a boil, whisking. 5. Reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes. 6. Toss with parmesan cheese (3/4 c) and pasta.

recipe.rDesc: 1 cup bread crumbs italian, 1 1/2 pounds lean hamburger, 3/4 cup pasta sauce, 1/2 cup onion, 1 tsp garlic, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup ketchup
recipe.rProc: 1. Mix hamburger, bread crumbs, sauce, onion, garlic and eggs. 2. Pat into a 9x5 loaf pan. 3. Cook 45 minutes at 350 degrees. Top with ketchup.

recipe.rDesc: 3/4 cup Ocean Spray Diet Cranberry Juice, 3/4 cup frozen berries, 3/4 cup nonfat light yogurt, 1/2 frozen banana, 1 orange peeled, 1/8 tsp. vanilla extract, 1/8 tsp. cinnamon
recipe.rProc: 1. Add everything to the blender and blend to your desired consistency.

recipe.rDesc: 1/4 cup chia seeds, 1 cup light or full-fat coconut milk, depending on preference, 1/2 tablespoon honey
recipe.rProc: 1. Mix chia seeds, coconut milk, and honey together in a small bowl or glass mason jar. Let it set in refrigerator overnight. 2. Remove it from the fridge, and make sure your pudding looks thick and the chia seeds have gelled. Top with fresh fruit and nuts, and enjoy immediately.

recipe.rDesc: 6 green peppers, 1 lb ground beef, 1/3 cup chopped onion, 2 cup tomatoes stewed, 3/4 cup minute rice
recipe.rProc: 1. Cut off tops of peppers, remove seeds, sprinkle w/salt. 2. Brown meat and onion, add tomoatoes, rice, worcestershire saice, sault and pepper to taste. 3. cover and simmer till rice is almost tender (about 5 minutes). 4. Stuff peppers, stand upright in baking dish, bake uncovered in 350 degree, for 25 minutesMay sprinle with cheese too.

recipe.rDesc: 1 Mango (peeled, pitted, and diced into 1/4 pieces), 1 Red Bell Pepper (steamed, stemmed, and diced into 1/4 pieces), 1 Red Onion (peeled and finely diced), 2 tbsp Fresh Mint (finely chopped), 1 tbsp Fresh Cilantro (finely chopped), 3 tbsp Lime Juice (freshly squeezed), 2 tbsp Mango puree, 1 Salt to taste, 1 Fresh Ground Pepper to taste, 1 Sugar to taste
recipe.rProc: 1. Mix ingredients in bowl, stirring vigorously.
